resources.string: JRE is an implementation of the Java Virtual Machine which executes Java programs.
JRE is an application development framework.
JRE is a java based GUI application.
Which method must be implemented by all threads?
What is the default value of int variable?
Serialization is the process of writing the state of an object to another object.
Serialization is the process of writing the state of an object to a byte stream.
This is the parent of Error and Exception classes.
WELCOME! This is a Java programming quiz. What is you name?

1) Answer: A 
 Explanation 
 Java Runtime Environment is an implementation of the Java Virtual Machine which executes Java programs. 
 
 2) Answer : C
 Explanation
 All threads must implement the run() method.
 
 3) Answer : A
 Explanation
 int variable has default value of 0 if defined as an instance/static variable.
 
 4) Answer : B
 Explanation
 Serialization is the process of writing the state of an object to a byte stream.
 
 5) Answer : C
 Explanation
 Throwable is the parent of both Error and Exception class.
 
 6) Answer : B
 Explanation
 Yes, class with private constructor can not instantiated using new keyword.
